content.question:
You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible.

You will have a conversation with Hiro Yamamato, a Japanese student, about an upcoming event.

Press record to begin each response to the conversation.

Response 1
